title: REDMI Note 10T 5G (Chromium White, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Power Adapter, Simple Protective Cover, USB Type-C Cable, Sim Eject Tool, User Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90Hz Refresh Rate, Contrast Ratio: 1500:1, Adaptive Sync Display: 30Hz / 50Hz/ 60Hz/ 90Hz
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 5G SA: N1, N3, N40, N77, N78, 5G NSA: N78, 4G FDD-LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G TDD-LTE: B40/B41, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8, 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8
product_specification.Primary Camera: 48MP Primary Camera + 2MP Macro Lens + 2MP Depth Sensor
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 120 fps) | Front Camera: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Sensor, Accelerometer, Gyro, Proximity Sensor, E-Compass
product_specification.Audio Formats: MP4, M4V, MKV, XVID, WAV, AAC, MP3, AMR, FLAC, APE
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty for Phone and 6 Months Warranty for In the Box Accessories

product_description.Powerful Mediatek Dimensity Processor: Powered by an efficient Mediatek Dimensity 700 Processor supported by 7 nm Valhall Architecture, this Redmi Note 10T mobile phone offers seamless gaming and high-end performance with low power consumption.
product_description.Efficient Mali G-57 with Valhall Archite: This smartphone features Mali G-57 combined with Valkun API to ensure an enhanced gaming experience and an improved ML inference performance.
product_description.Fast Supersonic Speed: The Redmi Note 10T 5G mobile phone is equipped with 5G connectivity and dual 5G SIM support that allows you to enjoy clear video calls, fast web browsing, and a smooth gaming experience.
product_description.Expanded FHD+ IPS Display: This mobile phone features a 16.5 cm (6.5) FHD+ display along with a 90 Hz adaptive refresh rate for a smooth scrolling and hassle-free streaming experience. Moreover, it comes with 360 degree light sensors so that you can automatically adjust the brightness of your mobile screen according to your surrounding environment.
product_description.Stunning AI Triple Camera: Capture the scenic landscape around you, in all its brilliance, using the 48 MP AI triple camera set up. Also, you can use different modes like Pro-color, Color Focus, Timelapse, and more to click stunning images with closer details.
product_description.AI Selfie Camera: The 8 MP AI selfie camera on this phone allows you to click high-resolution selfies. It also has features such as portrait mode to enhance the quality of your selfies.
product_description.Fast 5000 mAh Battery: The massive 5000 mAh of this mobile phone can provide up to two days of battery on a single full charge. Hence, it gives you enough juice to end your favorite game, stream content, and do more without any hassles.
product_description.Impactful EVOL Design: This smartphone features an EVOL Design containing small elements to add a stylish and impactful look to its appearance.
product_description.Scratch and Splash Proof: This mobile phone comes with a Corning Gorilla Glass so that your phone’s screen remains protected from accidental drops and scratches. Moreover, it features a splash-resistant design to ensure safety from rain and water splashes.

cons.Camera: Camera quality is very poor and not as promised.
